title: Get Your Act Together
overview: Get Your Act Together sees some of the UK's best-loved stars join forces with some of the world's most talented variety acts to put on a unique performance.Each week, host Stephen Mulhern will be joined by five different celebrities who battle it out to learn jaw dropping talents, from contortion to fire dancing, ventriloquism to acrobatics, juggling to plate spinning.Under the watchful guise of the world's most talented acts and performers, the celebrities will have intensive training to master their chosen skill. Viewers will see unique collaborations as the celebrity and their mentors then take to the stage together to perform in front of a studio audience.
